titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that reimbursements for costs of using passenger automobiles for charitable and other organizations are excluded from gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/2/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from an individual's gross income amounts received as reimbursement regarding the use of a passenger automobile for the benefit of a charitable organization. Relieves the organization of certain reporting requirements regarding the reimbursements.
